dumpHash() - Method in class DocumentCollection
called by the query @@debug dumps the current HashMap to system out Expected Complexity O(n)

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CLI
This is the main of the CLI class, its job is to take doccument arguments and build an pass them to the DocumentCollection class once the inverted index is built the CLI takes querys which can be used to search the index
makeHashMap() - Method in class DocumentCollection
Iterates through the of all the Document objects and calls the updateHashMap function for each document Expected Complexity: O(n^2)
makeListDocObjs(HashSet<String>, ArrayList<String>) - Method in class DocumentCollection
Takes array list of document paths and creates an ArrayList allTheDocs of Document objects also takes stoplist to know what words to exclude when creating each Document object Expected Comlexity: O(n^2)
makelistString(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class DocumentCollection
converts a list of words to a single string of those words Expceted Complexity: O(n)

Q

query(String, Boolean) - Method in class DocumentCollection
Takes a query and prints all the docs that contain that word(s) Expected Complexity 0(n)

R

T

toString() - Method in class Document

U

updateHashMap(HashMap<String, HashSet<Document>>) - Method in class Document
Is given a HashMap and runs through the words in the documents HashSet and checks if they are in the HashMap.
useageStatement() - Method in class CLI
